Summary: A good, quick source of protein
Text:
My husband is always hassling me to eat something good with protein, as I am a carb lover. These white meat chunk chicken in cans are great, because I'm terrible at meal planning. All of a sudden, I'll be hungry NOW, with no time to cook.

So I open a can of this Swanson chicken, drain it, dump it into a tupperware, add a couple heaping tablespoons of lite Miracle Whip, and start mashing at the chunks with a fork. I scoop up the newly made chicken salad with saltine, Ritz, or butter club crackers. Ta-da, instant protein-filled meal. This chicken would be great for serving to kids, too. I ALWAYS have cans of this in my cupboards. I can add some more flavor by adding ground black pepper, mustard, relish, and other kitchen staples.

It is cheaper at my local stores. But, if you can't get out to the store, I've always had great service from amazon!
